term.title: photocyclization

item.text: Intramolecular photochemical process leading to carbo- or hetero- cyclic ring systems by formation of one new single bond, either by a concerted process (e.g., electrocyclization) or by multi-step processes such as Norrish–Yang reaction, photoinduced electron transfer processes, Yang photocyclization and others.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 388 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
